author: Henry Besant
description: Pineapple and cardamon are a spectacular pairing of fruit and spice in this vodka laced 'Martini'.
name: Pineapple & Cardamom 'Martini'
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass
